mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BS_ANNOUNCEMENT ( IDX_BS_ANNOUNCEMENT, BS_ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE, ANNOUNCE_NUM, IS_FILE, SUBJECT, ANNOUNCE_CONTENTS, BS_STATUS, IS_NEW, IS_MAIN_PAGE, IS_IMPORTANT, IS_SHOW, VIEW_COUNT, ANNOUNCE_STATUS, POSTING_START_DATE, POSTING_END_DATE, DOC_VERSION, MEMO, SEARCH_TAG, AUTHOR, IDX_DEMO_BUSINESS, CONFIRM_ADMIN_IDX, IDX_ADMIN, REG_DATE, LAST_UPD_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_BS_ANNOUNCEMENT.NEXTVAL, #{bs_announcement_code}, #{announce_num}, #{is_file}, #{subject}, #{announce_contents}, #{bs_status}, #{is_new}, #{is_main_page}, #{is_important}, #{is_show}, #{view_count}, #{announce_status}, #{posting_start_date}, #{posting_end_date}, #{doc_version}, #{memo}, #{search_tag}, #{author}, #{idx_demo_business}, #{confirm_admin_idx}, #{idx_admin}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
